art.title: Art
art.description: Marketplace connected to physical galleries, collectors and offering a panel of exceptional works and artists

explore.title: With InRealArt
explore.subtitle: Explore a unique collection of physical canvases and sculptures rare, their digital copies (NFT), accompanied by their copyrights.

rare.title: Very Rare
rare.label: With over 80 years of combined experience, our sales team carefully selects fewer than 100 works from top artists.
rare.description: Here, each work, whether physical or digital, is carefully selected for its unique character. For seasoned collectors as well as novices, the possibility of acquiring such rare works is a privilege that allows one to stand out while significantly enriching a collection

marketplace.title: A Unique Marketplace
marketplace.label: Our marketplace stands out for its uniqueness and innovation, seamlessly integrating physical works, NFTs, and fractionalized copyrights.
marketplace.description: Through the use of blockchain, we guarantee transparency and security of transactions, while allowing clear traceability of each piece. This innovative combination offers collectors unprecedented access to diverse and exclusive works, while providing the possibility of acquiring copyrights and participating in a cutting-edge art market

investment.title: Investment Opportunity
investment.label: Art is more than just a passion, it's also an investment opportunity.
investment.description: Our marketplace offers you the possibility to diversify your portfolio by acquiring physical and digital artworks, as well as copyrights. Thanks to the rarity of the pieces offered, each acquisition has the potential to increase in value over time. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced collector, you have the chance here to be part of a dynamic market where each work can become a source of long-term appreciation

artists.label: Artists selected in our global catalog

works.label: Carefully chosen works to enhance your collection

ranking.label: of our artists are ranked in the ICAC 50-60 ranking

hero.title:

for Art Collectors and
Prestige Investors

authenticity.title: Complete Authenticity and Traceability
authenticity.description: Each artwork is authenticated by experts and certified on the blockchain for total transparency.

exclusivity.title: Exclusivity and Trust
exclusivity.description: The marketplace hosts only verified diverse artworks, each purchase is a guarantee of authenticity for cutting-edge works.

resale.title: Secure Resale Possibility
resale.description: Thanks to the ownership NFT, resale is simple, fast and secure, providing an authenticated link for buyers.

copyright.title: Copyright Purchase
copyright.description: Possibility to purchase a share of exceptional artwork for more control, with integrated liquidity for future acquisition.

prestige.subtitle: Unmatched Authenticity and Traceability
prestige.title:
InRealArt: A Trusted Market for
Prestige Art
prestige.description: InRealArt transforms the high-end art market by offering a marketplace where transparency, authenticity and exclusivity are at the heart of every transaction. Buy, sell, or invest in artworks with guaranteed provenance and uncompromising security.

selection.title: Selection of Certified Artworks
selection.description: In partnership with world-renowned artists and galleries, InRealArt offers a high-end collection of artworks. This brings together creations by major names in contemporary art, promising emerging talents, and works by essential masters.

verification.title: Verification Process
verification.description: Each artwork undergoes a rigorous verification and authentication process by our experts.

tokenization.title: Secure Tokenization
tokenization.description: Artworks are tokenized on the blockchain, creating a unique and tamper-proof digital certificate of ownership.

artistPage.expertDescription: With over 80 years of combined experience, our sales team carefully selects less than 100 works by top artists.
artistPage.expertDescription2: Here, each work, whether physical or digital, is carefully selected for its unique character. For seasoned collectors as well as newcomers, the opportunity to acquire rare works is a privilege that allows them to stand out while significantly enriching a collection.

faq.description: We often have legitimate questions, so we've anticipated them! If you have another question, check out the FAQ page

page.title: FAQ
page.description: Find here all the FAQs to give you what you need to know about our platform, how it works and what it can offer you

intro.title: The major steps
intro.subtitle: Art has opened up to new horizons with RWAs, and today we want to share these works with the whole world

description.0: Launch Art Marketplace on Testnet: Open the test environment for users to explore the platform, test functionalities, and provide feedback.
description.1: Introduce Fractionalization Features: Enable tokenized ownership of art assets on the platform, allowing users to fractionally own artworks.

description.0: PreSales Launch: Begin the ICO to raise funds for platform development and expansion, offering tokens for early supporters.
description.1: Develop Shopify Payment Integration: Work on integrating Shopify for seamless payments and transactions within the marketplace.
description.2: Pre-Sale Phase for Artwork Ownership: Begin pre-sales for limited edition artwork pieces with the option for tokenized fractional ownership.

description.0: Develop Gallery Creation Tools: Allow users to create virtual galleries, featuring both tokenized and traditional artworks.
description.1: Official Token Sale: Launch the official token sale, where users can purchase tokens through private and public rounds.
description.2: Enhanced DAO Features: Implement additional DAO functionality for enhanced governance, community engagement, and voting on platform features.

description.0: Launch Full Platform: Transition from testnet to mainnet and launch the full platform to the public with full payment and fractionalization functionality.
description.1: Gallery Creation Expansion: Facilitate the creation of physical or digital galleries for artists, integrated into the marketplace.
description.2: Secondary Market Launch: Enable a marketplace for buying and selling fractionalized artwork.

description.0: Final Development of Platform: Complete all platform development, ensuring smooth Shopify integration, advanced fractionalization options, and user-friendly navigation.
description.1: Begin Community Gallery Curation: DAO members vote to curate featured galleries based on their artistic preferences
description.2: Marketing and Partnerships: Secure strategic partnerships with art institutions, galleries, and other RWA projects to expand the platform's reach.

intro.title: Art has never been so accessible
intro.subtitle: Acquire rare physical works that can be linked with NFTs and their copyrights. Explore artwork fractioning and open your portfolio to the assets of the future

1.title:
Creation of a smart contract
for the presale
1.description:
This contract will automatically trigger the transfer of the NFT (purchase order) to the buyer once payment is confirmed.

It will also allow for automatic refund if the artwork is not collected within a specified timeframe.

intro.title: Use Cases
intro.subtitle: Discover how InRealArt transforms the art market through innovative use cases

collector.title: For Collectors
collector.description: Access a curated selection of rare artworks, both physical and digital, with guaranteed authenticity and provenance. Build your collection with confidence and enjoy exclusive benefits.
features: Access to rare and exclusive artworks

artist.title: For Artists
artist.description: Showcase your work to a global audience, maintain control over your creations, and benefit from new revenue streams through tokenization and copyright management.

investor.title: For Investors
investor.description: Diversify your portfolio with art investments, benefit from the potential appreciation of rare artworks, and participate in a growing market with transparent transactions.

lending.title: Financial Services for Art
lending.description: Access flexible financing solutions based on your artworks without having to sell them.

gallery.title: For Galleries
gallery.description: Expand your reach, connect with new collectors, and leverage blockchain technology to enhance the value and traceability of your artworks.

description.p1: Leasing with a purchase option (LOA), or Art Leasing, allows businesses to rent artwork or furniture for their professional spaces.
description.p2: Unlike purchasing, it offers tax and financial benefits: rental payments are deductible from taxable income, thus reducing tax (corporate or personal income tax).
description.p3: It also spreads the cost over the duration of the contract, generating tax savings. At the end of the term, acquisition is possible at an advantageous residual value.

advantages.title: Simplicity, flexibility, and optimization
advantages.subtitle: Leasing with purchase option (LOA) for artwork

items.title: Tax Advantage
items.description: Expenses are tax-deductible, allowing for tax optimization while investing in art for professionals.

items.title: Financial Flexibility
items.description: Financing costs are spread over a fixed period from 24 to 60 months.

items.title: Purchase Option
items.description: At the end of the contract, artworks can be acquired at an advantageous residual value.

benefits.title: The advantages of linking art and leasing

items.title: Tax and Accounting Benefits
items.description: Leasing allows contemporary art to be included in accounting expenses as a business asset, optimizing the company's tax position.

items.title: Access to Varied Artistic Offerings
items.description: Discover our selection of French and international contemporary artists, offering a wide choice of works from the contemporary art market, through a network of referenced galleries.

items.title: Asset Appreciation
items.description: Invest in artworks while benefiting from tax and financial advantages, contributing to the appreciation of your company's assets.

slider.title: Combine leasing, NFTs, and copyright
slider.subtitle: The art and technology sectors are constantly evolving. That's why InRealArt offers you an innovative optimization model, combining leasing, NFTs, smart contracts, and blockchain to meet your needs.

items.title: Traceability and Security through Blockchain
items.description: The NFT associated with the physical artwork guarantees its authenticity, tracks its provenance, and manages copyright transparently. This technology facilitates artwork management and ensures optimal traceability and security for buyers.

items.title: Simplified Rights Management
items.description: Smart contracts enable automated management of copyright and royalties, ensuring fair and transparent distribution of revenue among the various stakeholders.

items.title: Digital Valuation
items.description: Tokenizing artwork opens new possibilities for valuation and exposure in the digital universe, increasing its visibility and value potential.

investment.title: Investing in art for businesses
investment.description: Advice from an art market expert, General Tax Code, artistic leasing behind corporate collections, all while creating a genuine CSR approach through personalized monitoring of your project according to your objectives, brand image, and innovations.
bullets: Objectives and art market expertise for an image and heritage strategy
100% tax-deductible with ESG benefits, balance sheet optimization, corporate tax reduction (thus releasing cash flow and reallocation of savings)
Protection against inflation (diversification of uncorrelated and resilient assets) for SMEs

description.p1: Art serving your communication and brand! Capture attention and strengthen your messages through art!
description.p2: InRealArt designs exhibitions and artistic projects adapted to all budgets, enhancing your employer brand and CSR strategy
description.p3: With customized or rotating artworks, art becomes a powerful lever for innovative and engaging communication.

expert.title: Contact our experts
expert.quote: "InRealArt accompanies you in creating business art projects and offers made-to-measure customization at the service of your businesses, brands, institutions, and communities of all sizes."
expert.name: Catherine Meulemans

customization.title: Commission / Custom Artwork
customization.description: Create a mural to define or customize a large space, offer a monumental artwork for a new headquarters inauguration, design an exhibition that reflects company values, or host an artist in residence to highlight your commitments.

impact.title: Impact / Social Responsibility
impact.description: Initiate dialogue around Corporate Social and Cultural Responsibility, re-examine business practices, or mobilize stakeholders around high-impact themes such as Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI), Workplace Health and Safety, or sports.

art.title: Art / Solidarity
art.description: Organize meetings with artists, participate in workshops, or discover artworks with your teams, clients, and partners during corporate events. InRealart makes art accessible through labels, QR codes, guides, and catalogs, in a spirit similar to galleries or museums.

events.title: Events / Mediation
events.description: Solidarity murals, cultural sponsorship, corporate foundations, education and inclusion programs, charity auctions... Each artistic project becomes a vector for sharing, allowing everyone to contribute to their 'enterprise' in its original sense: undertaking and acting together.

step1.title: Define
step1.description: Set your budget, objectives, and project format: exhibition, fresco, artwork commission, or solidarity initiative...

step2.title: Select
step2.description: Choose the artists and/or artworks, and validate the concept with your teams.

step3.title: Contact our experts
step3.description: Our experts assist you in designing and implementing your artistic projects, offering tailored solutions to meet your needs.

newsletter.success: Your subscription has been successfully completed

hero.title: InRealArt Lending New Generation: Innovative Financing for the Art Market
hero.description: Transform your artworks into liquidity with InRealArt Lending, a flexible and secure solution to finance your development without traditional bank loans.

advantages.title: InRealArt Lending
advantages.subtitle: Benefit from secure and transparent financing through NFT technology. Use your artworks as collateral and obtain funds while maintaining control and ensuring impeccable traceability on the blockchain.
advantages.description: InRealArt Lending addresses the financial needs of galleries, collectors, and art dealers. We offer a tailored approach for each profession and category.

solutions.title: Tailored solutions
solutions.description: InRealArt Lending addresses the financial needs of galleries, collectors, and art dealers. We help you generate liquidity and value from your assets, ensure collection management and evaluation, all while guaranteeing a tailored approach for complete peace of mind.

alternative.title: InRealArt Lending offers a flexible alternative to bank loans and finances your acquisitions, expansions, or artistic projects.

forWho.title: Who is it for?
items: Galleries and Art Market Professionals: Transform your inventory into assets to seize growth opportunities
Collectors and Art Enthusiasts: Develop your collection while optimizing your assets
Institutions and Foundations: Leverage your artistic assets to finance new projects

whyChoose.title: Why choose InRealArt lending
items: Financial Optimization and Flexibility: Access liquidity while keeping your artworks
Security and Transparency via Blockchain: Enjoy high traceability and security
Access to Decentralized Finance (DeFi): Benefit from new Web3 opportunities to optimize your artistic assets

hero.title: Access fractionalized artworks through an exclusive marketplace.
hero.description: Access fractionalized artworks through an exclusive marketplace, offering unique and accessible investment opportunities. Ideal for collectors and investors looking to diversify their portfolio while benefiting from the growing value of art.

selection.title: Selection of Certified Artworks
selection.description: In partnership with world-renowned artists and galleries, InRealArt offers a high-end collection of artworks. This brings together creations by major names in contemporary art, promising emerging talents, and works by essential masters.

verification.title: Verification Process
verification.description: Each artwork undergoes a rigorous verification and authentication process by our experts.

tokenization.title: Tokenization and Fractionalization
tokenization.description: Artworks are tokenized and fractionalized on the blockchain, allowing investors to acquire shares of high-value artworks through unique and tamper-proof digital certificates of ownership.

accessibility.title: Access Prestigious Artworks
accessibility.description: Fractionalized tokenization allows you to invest in rare and prestigious artworks, even with a limited budget. By purchasing fractions of artworks, you become the owner of a share of art, without having to invest in the entire piece.

diversification.title: Diversify and Optimize Your Investments
diversification.description: Fractionalized tokenization allows you to diversify your portfolio by investing in a variety of artworks, offering protection against traditional market volatility. You can invest in contemporary artists, old masters, or even emerging talents, while spreading your risks.

liquidity.title: Enjoy Optimized Liquidity
liquidity.description: Thanks to our dedicated marketplace, you can easily buy and sell your tokens, offering flexibility and liquidity that traditional art cannot match. You can exchange your shares of artworks whenever you wish, with complete transparency.

transparency.title: Security and Traceability Guarantees
transparency.description: All transactions are recorded on the blockchain, ensuring maximum security and complete traceability. Each token represents a verified and authenticated part of the artwork, offering complete confidence in your investment.
